amendment.description: To require from the President a budget amendment for the budget for fiscal year 2004 on the amounts requested for military operations in Iraq in fiscal year 2004.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1264 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 41. Record Vote Number: 278.

Amendment SA 1264 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S9392-9399; text: CR S9392) To require from the President a budget amendment for the budget for fiscal year 2004 on the amounts requested for military operations in Iraq in fiscal year 2004.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1264 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 41. Record Vote Number: 278.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1264 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
